official-title.#text:
To provide for the conveyance of the David W. Dyer
		  Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Miami, Florida, to Miami Dade
		  College in Miami Dade County, Florida.

text.#text:
As soon as
			 practicable after the date of the enactment of this Act, but not later than 180
			 days after such date, the

The purpose of the
			 conveyance is to allow the College to use the Federal building and courthouse
			 as a cultural and educational complex, including additional class and
			 programming space for workforce training, community workshops, lectures,
			 performances, exhibitions, and screenings.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the conveyance required by this section shall be made
			 by quitclaim deed without consideration and without imposing any obligation,
			 term, or condition on the College.

under this section shall be made on the record after an opportunity for a
